title: Coastal regulation zone, except in cases where it is permissible to Utilised TDR as per CRZ Notification 2011 and subsequent amendment from time to time’
clause_text: Coastal regulation zone, except in cases where it is permissible to Utilised TDR as per CRZ Notification 2011 and subsequent amendment from time to time’.
section: .1 Utilization of Transferable Development Rights (TDR ) and Road Width Relation will be govern by regulation 30 (A) subject to following notes:-
